channel.title: Emily Austin on
channel.description: Recent content in Emily Austin on

item.title: Everyone in This Room Will Someday Be Dead
item.description: This is the most strongly coded [[notes/autism|autistic]] protagonist I’ve read. Especially of the female, high-masking, chronic burnout variety, and undiagnosed. (Or rather, insufficiently diagnosed with anxiety and depression.) The unconscious stimming! Chronic sensory overload! The shutdowns! The meltdowns! The masking! I feel like I am operating my body like it’s a vehicle.

item.title: Interesting Facts about Space
item.description: Me [page 1]: I’m worried I read too much about [[notes/autism|ASD]] into [[books/everyone in this room will someday be dead|Everyone in This Room Will Someday be Dead]]. This time I’m gonna look for all the ways it’s not autism. I will counteract my bias. Me [page 20]: This is autism.
